Expected Goals.Description: The sum of the probabilities of unblocked shot attempts being goals. For example, a rebound shot in the slot may be worth 0.5 expected goals, while a shot from the blueline while short handed may be worth 0.01 expected goals. The expected value of each shot attempt is calculated by the MoneyPuck Expected Goals model. Expected goals is commonly abbreviated as "xGoals". Blocked shot attempts are valued at 0 xGoals. See more here: http://moneypuck.com/about.htm#shotModel

Score Adjusted.Description: Adjusts metrics to gives more credit to away teams and teams with large leads.

I_F.Description: "Individual For". For stats credited to an individual. For example, I_F_goals is the number of goals a player has scored

OnIce_F.Description: "On-ice For". Every player on the ice on the team doing the event receives credit. OnIce_F_goals is the number of goals the player's team has scored while that player is on the ice, regardless of if they were the one who scored the goal or not.

OnIce_A.Description: "On-ice Against". Every opposing team's players on the ice on receives credit. OnIce_A_goals is the number of goals the player's team has given up while the player is on the ice

OffIce_F.Description: "Off-ice For". Every player on the bench of  the team doing the event receives "credit". OffIce_F_goals is the number of goals the player's team has scored while that player is on the bench.

OffIce_A.Description: "Off-ice Against". Every player on the opposing team's bench of  the team doing the event receives "credit". OffIce_A_goals is the number of goals the player's team has given up while that player is on the bench.

Low Danger Shots.Description: Unblocked Shot attempts with a < 8% probability of being a goal. Low danger shots accounts for ~75% of shots and ~33% of goals

Medium Danger Shots.Description: Unblocked Shot attempts with between >=8% but less than 20% probability of being a goal. Medium danger shots account for ~20% of shots and ~33% of goals

High Danger Shots.Description: Unblocked Shot attempts  with >= 20% probability of being a goal. High danger shots account for ~5% of shots and ~33% of goals

playerId.Description: Unique ID for each player assigned by the NHL

season.Description: Starting year of the season. For example 2018 for the 2018-2019 season

situation.Description: 5on5 for normal play, 5on4 for a normal powerplay, 4on5 for a normal PK. 'Other' includes everything else: two man advantage, empty net, 4on3, etc. 'all' includes all situations

shifts.Description: Number of shifts a player had

gameScore.Description: Game Score rating as designed by @domluszczyszyn

onIce_xGoalsPercentage.Description: On Ice xGoals For / (On Ice xGoals For + On Ice xGoals Against)

offIce_xGoalsPercentage.Description: Off Ice xGoals For / (Off Ice xGoals For + Off Ice xGoals Against)

onIce_corsiPercentage.Description: On Ice Shot Attempts For / (On Ice Shot Attempts For + On Ice Shot Attempts Against)

offIce_corsiPercentage.Description: Off Ice Shot Attempts For / (Off Ice Shot Attempts For + Off Ice Shot Attempts Against)

onIce_fenwickPercentage.Description: On Ice Unblocked Shot Attempts For / (On Ice Unlbocked Shot Attempts For + On Ice Unbloked Shot Attempts Against)

offIce_fenwickPercentage.Description: Off Ice Unblocked Shot Attempts For / (Off Ice Unlbocked Shot Attempts For + Off Ice Unbloked Shot Attempts Against)

iceTimeRank.Description: Rank of the player's ice time in a given game. Forwards and Defensemen are ranked seperately. 1 means the player got more icetime in the game than any other forward/D.

I_F_xOnGoal.Description: Expected number of unblocked shot attempts that are expected to be a shot on goal (not miss the net) given the context (distance, situation, etc) they were taken from. This assumes the player has average shooting talent.

I_F_xGoals.Description: Expected Goals. See 'General Concepts' tab for more info.

I_F_xRebounds.Description: Expected Rebounds. The expected number of rebound shots generated from the player's unblocked shot attempts.

I_F_xFreeze.Description: Expected puck freezes after shots. The expected number of puck freezes by the goalie after the player's unblocked shot attempts.

I_F_xPlayStopped.Description: Expected number of times the play is stopped after shots for reasons other than the goalie freezing the puck, such as the puck going over the glass or a dislodged net.

I_F_xPlayContinuedInZone.Description: Expected number of times the play continues in the offensive zone after the player's shot besides an immediate rebound shot. This is proxied by another event happening in the zone after the shot (such as a hit, takeaway, etc) without any events outside of the zone happening inbetween and all the same players for both teams are still on the ice as they were for the original shot

I_F_xPlayContinuedOutsideZone.Description: Expected number of times the play goes outside the offensive zone after the player's shot.

I_F_flurryAdjustedxGoals.Description: Flurry Adjusted Expected Goals. See 'General Concepts' tab for more info.

I_F_scoreVenueAdjustedxGoals.Description: Score and Venue Adjusted xGoals. Gives more credit to away teams and teams with large leads when they get an xGoal.

I_F_flurryScoreVenueAdjustedxGoals.Description: Fluury and Score and Venued Adjusted xGoals

I_F_primaryAssists.Description: Primary Assists the player has received on teammates' goals

I_F_secondaryAssists.Description: Secondary Assists the player has received on teammates' goals

I_F_shotsOnGoal.Description: Shots on goal. Does not include shots that miss the net or blocked shots

I_F_missedShots.Description: Missed shots. Shots that aren't blocked but don't hit the net

I_F_blockedShotAttempts.Description: Blocked shot attempts. The numbe of shot attempts a player has taken that were blocked by the opponent's team

I_F_shotAttempts.Description: Shot attempts. Includes shots on goal, missed shots, and blocked shot attempts

I_F_rebounds.Description: Rebound shot attempts. These must occur within 3 seconds of a previous shot.

I_F_freeze.Description: Puck freezes after a player's shots. The  number of puck freezes by  goalies after the player's unblocked shot attempts.

I_F_playStopped.Description: Number of times the play is stopped after shots for reasons other than the goalie freezing the puck, such as the puck going over the glass or a dislodged net.

I_F_playContinuedInZone.Description: Number of times the play continues in the offensive zone after the player's shot besides an immediate rebound shot. This is proxied by another event happening in the zone after the shot (such as a hit, takeaway, etc) without any events outside of the zone happening inbetween and all the same players for both teams are still on the ice as they were for the original shot

I_F_playContinuedOutsideZone.Description: Number of times the play goes outside the offensive zone after the player's shot.

I_F_savedShotsOnGoal.Description: Number of the player's unblocked shots that were saved by the goalie

I_F_savedUnblockedShotAttempts.Description: Number of the player's unblocked shots that were saved by the goalie or missed the net

penalties.Description: Number of penalties the player has received. Both majors and minors both count as '1'

I_F_penalityMinutes.Description: Number of penalty minutes the player has received

I_F_faceOffsWon.Description: Number of faceoffs the player has won

I_F_hits.Description: Number of hits the player has given

I_F_takeaways.Description: Number of takeaways the player has taken from opponents

I_F_giveaways.Description: Number of giveaways the player has given to other team

I_F_mediumDangerShots.Description: Medium danger shots (Between 8% and 20% xGoal Value)

I_F_highDangerShots.Description: High Danger Shots (Betwen 8% and 20% xGoal Value)

I_F_lowDangerxGoals.Description: Sum of expected goals from low danger shots

I_F_mediumDangerxGoals.Description: Sum of expected goals from medium danger shots

I_F_highDangerxGoals.Description: Sum of expected goals from high danger shots

I_F_scoreAdjustedShotsAttempts.Description: Shot attempts adjusted for score and venue

I_F_unblockedShotAttempts.Description: All shot attempts that weren't blocked

I_F_scoreAdjustedUnblockedShotAttempts.Description: Unblocked shot attempts adjusted for score and venue

I_F_dZoneGiveaways.Description: Giveaways in the team's defensive zone

I_F_xGoalsFromxReboundsOfShots.Description: Expected Goals from Expected Rebounds of player's shots. Even if a shot does not actually generate a rebound, if it's a shot that is likely to generate a rebound the player is credited with xGoalsFromxRebounds

I_F_xGoalsFromActualReboundsOfShots.Description: Expected Goals from actual rebounds shots of player's shots.

I_F_xGoals_with_earned_rebounds.Description: xGoals With Earned Rebounds. Also known as 'Created Expected Goals': Expected Goals of non-rebound shots + xGoals of xRebounds of all shots. This metric gives credit to the player that created the original shot, opposed to the player getting the rebound. See http://moneypuck.com/about.htm#xRebounds for more info

I_F_xGoals_with_earned_rebounds_scoreAdj.Description: Score adjusted xGoals With Earned Rebounds

I_F_xGoals_with_earned_rebounds_scoreFlu.Description: Score and flurry adjusted xGoals With Earned Rebounds

I_F_shifts.Description: Number of shifts a player had

I_F_oZoneShiftStarts.Description: Number of offensive zone face-off shift starts a player had

I_F_dZoneShiftStarts.Description: Number of defensive zone face-off shift starts a player had

I_F_neutralZoneShiftStarts.Description: Number of neutral zone face-off shift starts a player had

I_F_flyShiftStarts.Description: Number of shift starts on the fly a player had

I_F_oZoneShiftEnds.Description: Number of player's shifts that end with an offensive zone faceoff for the oncoming players

I_F_dZoneShiftEnds.Description: Number of player's shifts that end with a defensive zone faceoff for the oncoming players

I_F_neutralZoneShiftEnds.Description: Number of player's shifts that end with a neutral zone faceoff for the oncoming players

I_F_flyShiftEnds.Description: Number of player's shifts that end on the fly

faceoffsWon.Description: Number of faceoffs the player has won

faceoffsLost.Description: Number of faceoffs the player has lost

timeOnBench.Description: Amount of time the player has been on the bench for. (in seconds)

penalityMinutes.Description: Number of penalty minutes the player has received

penalityMinutesDrawn.Description: Number of penalty minutes the player has drawn

penaltiesDrawn.Description: Number of penalties the player has drawn

shotsBlockedByPlayer.Description: Number of shot attempts blocked by the player

OnIce_F_xOnGoal.Description: "On Ice For" version of xOnGoal stat. Gives credit to all of the team's players on the ice for the event, opposed to just the player who did the event

OnIce_A_xOnGoal.Description: "On Ice Against" version of xOnGoal stat. Gives 'credit' to all of the opposing team's player on ice for the event.

xGoalsForAfterShifts.Description: xGoals the player's team gets between 1 and 5 seconds after the player has shifted off on the fly. Meant to give credit to give players who leave the ice when the puck is going towards the opposing team's zone

xGoalsAgainstAfterShifts.Description: xGoals the opposing team gets between 1 and 5 seconds after the player has shifted off on the fly. Meant to identify players who shift off instead of backchecking

corsiForAfterShifts.Description: Shot attempts the player's team gets between 1 and 5 seconds after the player has shifted off on the fly. Meant to give credit to give players who leave the ice when the puck is going towards the opposing team's zone

corsiAgainstAfterShifts.Description: Shot attempts the opposing team gets between 1 and 5 seconds after the player has shifted off on the fly. Meant to identify players who shift off instead of backchecking

fenwickForAfterShifts.Description: Unblocked Shot attempts the player's team gets between 1 and 5 seconds after the player has shifted off on the fly. Meant to give credit to give players who leave the ice when the puck is going towards the opposing team's zone

fenwickAgainstAfterShifts.Description: Unblocked Shot attempts the opposing team gets between 1 and 5 seconds after the player has shifted off on the fly. Meant to identify players who shift off instead of backchecking
